info.title: AI Forecasting
info.summary: Basic API to train and obtain forecasts from AI Forecasting

post.description:
This API Endpoint receives historical training data in the form of a JSON file, which contains:

'time', a list of strings with datetime information of the time series, freq = 15min

'load', a list of floats, which corresponds to a net-load time series of a given network point

The model is trained with the POSTed data and the model is stored

The API responds with error metric scores (MAE, SMAPE and RMSE) obtained when evaluating the model's forecasts using a test dataset (a subset of the original training set)

get.description: This endpoint provides the training status of the model and the timestamp when it was last trained
